page.title: 11Farms
page.content: The area is mostly agricultrual. Farms are in mainly large units averaging {200 to 800 acres.}Some are family owned and run but much land is rented from large corporations. The main {cereal crops}are wheat & barley. Oil seed rape, beans & peas for vining are plentiful. An experimental crop of {evening primrose}has been grown this year.{Root crops}are mostly potatoes & sugar beet. A fruit farm has{11 acres of soft fruit for public picking.{Beef cattle}are winter housed, fed on silage, hay and concentrates - out to graze in summer. {Sheep farming}produces meat; wool clipped in May, sheep dipped in July to kill warble flies. One farmer has a {battery hen unit,}also{pig rearing sheds.{Trout}is reared in special ponds of fresh running water.
